overview: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up to a blind date to scare him away. But plans go awry when he turns out to be her CEO — and makes a proposal.

1.episodeTitle: Let's do it together, get married
1.episodeOverview: To appease his grandfather's wishes, Kang Tae-moo agrees to a blind date. Jin Young-seo enlists Shin Ha-ri's help to scare away her latest prospect.
Tae-moo lies about having a girlfriend to stop the endless barrage of blind dates, with the perfect person in mind to play the part.

1.episodeTitle: Don't try this fake relationship, try a real relationship
1.episodeOverview: Ha-ri has a long list of facts about Tae-moo to memorize — as well as someone important to meet. Young-seo declares her independence.
In and outside of work, Ha-ri scrambles to hide her true identity from Tae-moo and his grandfather. A fake one-year anniversary comes up.
As payback for being fooled, Tae-moo sets a trap for Ha-ri at a company event. But when she drunkenly apologizes, he has a change of heart.

1.episodeTitle: My name is Hari's boyfriend Kang Tae-moo
1.episodeOverview: When plans for a confession go awry, Tae-moo takes Ha-ri on a date by the sea disguised as a work trip. Cha Sung-hoon confronts a red-faced Young-seo.
Tae-moo plays the part of Ha-ri's smitten boyfriend in front of her friends, much to the chagrin of a wary Lee Min-woo and a jealous Go Yoo-ra.

1.episodeTitle: I want to think about just the two of us
1.episodeOverview: Calling their kiss a mistake, Ha-ri continues to reject Tae-moo's advances. But an unreturned text and word of his blind date stir up her emotions.
Jo Yoo-jung falls for Sung-hoon, landing him in hot water with Young-seo. Tae-moo and Ha-ri try to keep their relationship a secret at work.

1.episodeTitle: Thank you for taking me in like this
1.episodeOverview: Kang Da-goo's suspicions about his grandson's love life are proven true. On a rainy night after work, Ha-ri takes Tae-moo out on a date.
When Ha-ri's personal life becomes the talk of the town, Tae-moo's grandfather gives her an ultimatum. Young-seo's dad suggests dinner with Sung-hoon.
Ha-ri tries to win Da-goo over by keeping him company at his hospital bedside. A worried Tae-moo asks Ha-ri to go to the U.S. with him.
